extendedInfo.description: Beer Pong fans rejoice! Beer Pong HD is the ultimate FREE Beer Pong game for your Androidâ¢ phone! It has the best graphics, most realistic physics and uses the official rules as used in the World Series of Beer Pong. Throwing balls is very easy, it uses a similar mechanic as seen in Angry Birds : Pull the ball back, aim and shoot. So you will still be able to pick this game up if even when you had a few beers yourself. Or you can play the game against an online opponent and compare your score on the location based leaderboards!Can your ego handle the trash talk of the A.I. opponents? Become the ultimate Beer Pong champion!Full set of features:- It's FREE!- Downloaded over 1.5 million times!- Great 3D visuals and realistic physics!- Real rewards for virtual achievements!- Location based leaderboards; see who's best in your hometown!- Super awesome drunkeness simulator!- Online and local multiplayer modes- Official rules as used in the World Series of Beer Pong- Easy to pick up throwing mechanism similar to Angry Birds- Many, many tables, like football, basketball, 4th of July, Oktoberfest, Halloween, Christmas, bikini babe and zombie tables!If you have any suggestions for features, things we could do better, please send us an email!Also, don't forget to follow us on Twitter or like us on Facebook if you want to keep up to date!https://www.facebook.com/codegluehttp://twitter.com/codeglue[coming soon]- New challenging scoring system- Challenge your personal friends[special thanks]- Hugo Smits, Orange Pixel, Tim Vogel, Bushweed, Whatisvisceral for their cool table designs!- Orange Pixel for their cool Meganoid game! Go check it out! :)

reviews.title: Crashes out on my galaxy
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t even allow me to open the app.. always crashes out on the start up screen itself!  Need update!  Still the same issue even after the new update! Please fix it asap!
reviews.author: goutham reddy

reviews.title: Won\'t open
reviews.comment: So, I installed app. I hit play, enter my name and hit continue, and nothing happens!!!! Wth??!!!!
reviews.author: Jill Delgado

reviews.title: It crashes
reviews.comment: It crashes whenever I try to open
reviews.author: Mukul Sharma

reviews.title: Thanks for fixing the crashing issue...
reviews.comment: Fun game for sure, here\'s your 5 stars
reviews.author: Doug Place

reviews.title: Every single name
reviews.comment: Is in use, random letters like hsjsixjeb are used -_-
reviews.author: Sam Muss Tta

reviews.title: App sucks
reviews.comment: This app suck I don\'t recommend it to ANYBODY!!
reviews.author: Eli Abrego

reviews.title: Cannot play.
reviews.comment: Only asks for name and everything is used.
reviews.author: Rob Spatz

reviews.comment: Good game
reviews.author: Brandon Stout

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: When I\'m in school and bored I just play this game and addicting
reviews.author: Andres Alvarez

reviews.title: Good effort but...
reviews.comment: This app crashes constantly when it trys to pull up the ads between rounds. I have been unable to complete a game out of several trys.
reviews.author: Kevin Tucker

reviews.title: Dissapointed
reviews.comment: Quite dissapoinyed that when i go into the game,i go to press on enter name here,n it freezes n doesnt do anything,so you have to force close it or turn your phone off,me no likey
reviews.author: Josh Webster

reviews.title: So,so\'
reviews.comment: It just closes out during a game and when I win. I love the changing of the table and the accuracy of shooting. ...but I can\'t finish a game!
reviews.author: christa moody

reviews.title: Sucks donkey balls
reviews.comment: Every time I get down to 5 cups the game cuts off on me and I have to start all over again
reviews.author: Charles Conner

reviews.title: it is rubbish
reviews.comment: On my game it does whatever move you do and copies it and freezes whenever you get to 7 don\'t buy this app it just takes up space
reviews.author: Warren Robert Barlow

reviews.title: Double-u, Tee, Eff
reviews.comment: Good game, but can\'t even finish the first one without it crashing. Please fix soon, thanks
reviews.author: Say Garcia

reviews.title: Short changed... :(
reviews.comment: I like the concept of the game, but I can\'t finish a single game. Crashes about as much as you would, playing Crash Bandicoot, or however you spell it.
reviews.author: Lin Da

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: If it would stop freezing every single game it would be the best beer pong app on the market, sucks when you get to last cup and then guess what...FREEZE. its a shame because the gameplay is great and online feature is cool but cmon.... stop F****** freezing
reviews.author: Ryan Barrett

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: Kindle and android won\'t let me get past the enter my name to play. Extremely disappointing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beer pong
reviews.comment: This game is pretty awesome. graphics are amazing. I love how the picture moves when shooting drunk. Great job guys!  Just wish i can bounce the ball into a cup and elimate two cups just like the real game.
reviews.author: Fernando Lopez

reviews.comment: This game would be legit if iT DOESN\'T CRASH SO QUICK! Can\'t even finish game two. Always restarting.\tI still play though.
reviews.author: Tino Juarez
